transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sakina sir, alama baat kar rahe ho IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Sir aapse kal baat nahi ho payi thi, mujhe baat karni thi aapse thoda services ko leke. To kab baat ho sakti hai jab aapse?
Customer: Kal koi koi phone lagai the na koi ladka mere ko. Main koi sales.
Executive: Ladka to main maine call kiya tha aapko aapne bola tha sham ko call karne ko maine kiya baad me fir cut kar diya tha call.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan. Main keh rahi hu sir aur ek aadmi se baat hua tha mere.
Customer: Sir meri se call maine call kiya tha aapko. Nahi nahi nahi nahi aapne call nahi kiya tha aapko. Aur ek banda phone lagaya tha mere ko maine bola tha usko mere ko call connect nahi ho raha hai lekin mere paas abhi banda nahi hai. Pehle ek ladka tha wo karta tha IndiaMART ka sabhi dekhta tha lekin abhi koi nahi hai iske liye wo nahi ho raha hai. Aur jo mera catalog ke hisab se call nahi aa raha hai jo alag alag hi call aa raha hai bol ke bola tha maine.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan jo catalog me product hai wo product ka call nahi aa raha hai koi alag alag hi aa raha hai to apne ko connect karne ko dikkat ho raha hai.
Executive: Isiliye maine call kiya tha sir ki aap keh rahe the problem aa rahi hai aur aapne feedback bhi no de diya tha.
Customer: Maharashtra, Karnataka, Telangana aur idhar tak chalta hai ye wo Bangladesh kya wo apna West Bengal, Jammu Kashmir udhar ka aa raha hai to wo apne ko nahi connect to nahi ho raha hai wo. Maine sab details bataya tha unko.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Sir sir mujhe abhi jo mere paas update hai usme to mujhe dikh nahi raha ki aapki kis se baat hui hai kyunki last kal maine aapko call kiya tha to aapne bola tha ki theek hai main ek bar baat karunga aapse detail me but maine jab aapko sham ko call kiya to aapne fir phone cut kar diya tha mera. To main chah rahi thi sir thoda sa aap agar mujhe 15 minute apna de de to main ek bar aapse properly discuss kar lu agar abhi bhi aap available hai to baat kar lete hai. Theek hai? Sir abhi aapke catalog me aapko kaha problem hai aap pehle keh rahe ho ki sabse pehle area ka problem ho raha hai right aap?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Accha area me kya problem aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi abhi kya hai madam state matlab Karnataka language ka bhi problem hai.
Executive: Hmm. Accha.
Customer: Language ka issue hai. Hum bolte hai to wo samne samne samajh me nahi aata hai unko agar wo bolte hai to apne ko samajh me nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Accha but sir aapka to area Karnataka ka hai na to aap to matlab main assume kar rahi hu ki aapko to local language aati hogi ya fir us side ki.
Customer: Karnataka ka apan cover kar sakte hai ye West Bengal aur ye idhar ka hai na apan nahi cover kar sakte madam.
Executive: To West Bengal me to Hindi boli jati hai sir.
Customer: Nahi Bangali baat karte hai wo. Bangali kidhar aati hai apne ko.
Executive: Accha sir main ek suggestion du aapko sir. Dekhiye hamare paas bhi client hai jo Bengali Bengal ke hai aur aapke side ke bhi hai sir client south ke. Theek hai? Sir main bolungi ek bar jab aap baat kiya kariye na to unse puch liya kariye ki aap Hindi me baat kar sakte ho ki nahi kar sakte ho kyunki sir hamare sath kabhi bhi jaise main apna personal bata rahi hu hamare sath kabhi problem nahi hua kisi Bengali client ke sath ki unko Hindi na aati ho Hindi to basic hai sir us side me Hindi to bolte hi hai main bas ek suggestion aapko de rahi hu. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm theek hai waise dekhta hu ek bar.
Executive: Haan ek bar aap unse kyunki sir sir problem nahi hota hai sir hamare paas to pura client base hi hai West Bengal ka to udhar se to koi problem nahi hoti hai. Ab ek to aap bol rahe ho language ka dusri cheez sir kya leads ka kya problem aa rahi hai sir aapne feedback no kyun diya tha kuch reason isi reason ki wajah se feedback no diya hame?
Customer: Feedback note me kya hai madam? Kya aapne unsatisfied diya tha ki IndiaMART se aap unsatisfied ho.
Customer: Hmm. Wo to abhi jo catalog me hai wo wo nahi hota hai wo koi dosage hi puchta hai. Matlab ek product abhi usme ek humne M45 liya uska kya praman hai usme kitna use karna hai wo to hum nahi kar rahe na madam wo wo customer wo puchta hai aur koi kya ho raha hai koi customer supply hota hai to fir abhi material nikla nahi hai maine to payment dal diya hai wo apne ko aa raha hai apan kuch kare nahi to kidhar se karenge.
Executive: Accha. Okay.
Executive: Abhi main product aapka kaun sa chal raha hai sir Syngenta insecticides, Bayer insecticides ye sab aapke main products hai sir?
Customer: Haan ye main product hai jo catalog me hai na madam wahi chahiye apne ko wo abhi isme ek aata hai koi itophone ye apna kaun sa to ek content bata raha tha wo content wala catalog me sahi nahi to kidhar se denge usko.
Executive: Matlab accha koi product bata rahe the alag se?
Customer: Haan alag se product bata rahe the.
Executive: Aapke sir yaha pe 209 product dale hai sir. Theek hai? But product me bhi hota hai ki kuch main product hote hai ki jaise ye jo aapka Syngenta insecticide hai Syngenta koi brand ka naam hai sir ya product ka naam hai ye?
Customer: Haan brand ka naam hai company ka naam hai.
Executive: Accha accha okay company ka naam hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir dekhiye kya hota hai ek cheez main batati hu aap waise search aapko thoda sa mushkil kyun ho raha hai dekhiye aap brand ho ek company. Theek hai? Ab kya hota hai sir ki customer kabhi bhi jaise product ko agar koi bahut ekdam sir famous product hai to theek hai nahi to sir customer search karta hai insecticides ke naam se. Theek hai? Ab wo search karega sir main aapko ye bolungi ki rather than ki aap isko as a product full product search kare ki Syngenta insecticide main sahi pronounce kar rahi hu na sir isko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to usko aap na sirf insecticides ke naam se search karna shuru kariye sir. Theek hai? Ab usse hoga kya?
Customer: Kya karta hai wo customer insecticide bol ke search karta hai na to usko pata hi nahi rehta hai ki insecticide kya hai fungicide kya hai aur apna herbicide kya hai wo khali ek hi puchte rehta hai insecticide hai kya insecticide me kafi sare product aate hai.
Executive: Varieties aati hai.
Customer: Haan to usme usko pata hi nahi to kitne bar apan usko samjhayenge wo samajhne hi nahi aa raha hai usko to kya karenge apan usko.
Executive: Accha okay.
Customer: Haan wo insecticide abhi wo puchta hai dusra product are bhai wo insecticide nahi hai wo herbicide hai herbicide kis me use hota hai kis praman me use hota hai ye sab usko bolte kidhar baithenge apan wo samajh me nahi aata usko.
Executive: Sir par sare customer to aise nahi hote honge na jo fungicide ko search kar rahe honge to wo fungicide hi search kar rahe honge wo jo jis specific reason se wo search kar rahe hai wahi kar rahe honge na sir?
Customer: To wahi wahi search kar rahe hai lekin unko pata nahi rahega to kya search karenge madam repeat repeat to idhar hi aayega na phone.
Executive: Accha accha din din din me agar wo char bar call lagayega to call idhar hi connect hoga to fir usse wahi baat hoga wahi bolenge to fir kya matlab hai kya dusra kam chod ke wahi karte baithenge to fir dikkat hota hai.
Executive: Accha. Sir main na abhi aapki leads search kar rahi hu theek hai aapki fungicide ke liye aur insecticide ki to usme mujhe specifically Bayer jo aapka product hai na sir uske liye mujhe leads dikh rahi hai. Theek hai? Customer ne Bayer ke liye hi search kiya hai. Sir sabse pehle to aap profile sir aap roz catalog open karte hai matlab buyleads ka?
Customer: Nahi kya tha ek ladka tha mere paas me staff team tha wo usne chod diya hai abhi. Haan. To iske liye ye dikkat aa raha hai abhi wo ladka milne ke liye mere ko time lag raha hai to main nahi dekh sakta wo wo ladke ko hi bithaya tha maine usne drop kar diya abhi wo dikkat aa raha hai isme.
Executive: Sir par pata hai kya main ab suggestion dungi ki agar aapke paas phone me app to hoga thoda bahut search karke sir aapko to sari knowledge hai product ki agar possible ho to aap thoda lead utha lijiye kyunki kya hota hai sir jab inactivity hoti hai na profile pe ab ye pura artificial intelligence pe kam karta hai sir. Theek hai? To fir sir na aapki na listing kam hoti hai ab jab aap ek mahine do mahine baad kisi ko rakhenge na to aapko teen char mahina lagega sir usko revive karne me. Theek hai? To wo aapko problem karega sir fir aap wahi hai hamare paas aaoge ki conversion nahi aa raha hame response nahi aa raha hai. Theek hai? To is main bolungi ki agar ho sake to aap ek bar phone se sir search karke bas jaise aapka product hai Syngenta insecticides hai ya Bayer insecticides hai inko sir search karke aap unki lead consume kariye. Theek hai? Sir zyada mat kariye har daily ke basis pe ek bar app open kar lijiye sir aur do teen leads consume kar lijiye so that ki aapki profile ki jo ek listing hai wo maintain rahe.
Executive: Theek hai? Pehli cheez ye hai. To sir kisi ko to rakhna padega fir hi to aapka thoda catalog better rahega sir nahi to fir kya fayda sir online pe to dekhiye sir active rehna padta hai iski bas ek hi cheez hoti hai karne ke liye. Theek hai?
Executive: To ek bar isko koshish kariye sir agar aap active ho sakte hai active ho jaiye aur kya problem aa rahi hai sir iske alawa?
Customer: Nahi wahi problem hai.
Executive: Theek hai to sir main koshish karungi ek bar aapke account manager jo hai unse ek bar aapka whatsapp number add karwa ke hum koshish karte hai aapko kuch leads share karne ki. Theek hai? Aapke utna wo aapke liye easy ho jayega sir aap consume kar paoge sir leads ko?
Customer: Abhi kya hai madam jab tak ladka nahi milega na tab tak wo kam nahi hoga. Kyunki main baith ke nahi kar sakta usme kam.
Executive: Haan main samajh rahi hu sir aapke paas aur bhi business handle karne ka hai.
Executive: To ek cheez aur sir please sir ek cheez main request karungi main aapko whatsapp karti hu aap ek bar calls uthaiye IndiaMART ki chaliye aap buyleads utha nahi pa rahe but calls to sir uthaiye 15 15 calls 37 calls aapke miss ho rahi hai sir. Is time fir aisa aayega sir ki aapko calls hi aana band ho jayengi. Kyunki aapki listing girti jayegi profile pe.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko ek bar whatsapp pe detail karti hu sir aap ek bar check kariye aur sir na aapne na wo not satisfied kar diya tha main fir se aapko ek mail aapko whatsapp jayega sir aap request hai aap ek bar fir please mujhe feedback me yes kar dijiyega aur kuch comment dena ho to de dijiyega main ek bar aapse whatsapp pe connect karwati hu aapke account manager se. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai alright sir koi problem hogi to aap mujhe direct is number pe call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay thank you so much sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving calls as per catalog.

- Language barrier with leads from different states.

- Unsatisfied with lead quality; irrelevant inquiries.

- Staff shortage affecting profile management.

- Unable to manage profile and leads.



Resolution:

- Suggested searching by product type instead of brand.

- Advised to ask leads if they can speak Hindi.

- Offered to share leads via WhatsApp.

- Recommended consuming a few leads daily.

- Executive will connect with account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share leads via WhatsApp.

- Customer to update feedback to 'yes'.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, language barrier, profile management, insecticides, account manager
